sentences.english: Separate complex keys or indices from their surrounding brackets.
sentences.chinese: 对复杂的键或索引，将其与周围的括弧分开。

sentences.english: The teacher bracketed the mistakes in my homework.
sentences.chinese: 老师用括弧标出了我家庭作业中的错误。

sentences.english: Parentheses: trades women and peddlers excepted.
Write a one word description beside each goal in brackets.
sentences.chinese: 在每个目标旁边用括弧写上一个单词的描述。

sentences.english: Put your name in brackets at the top of each page.
sentences.chinese: 把你的名字填在每页上端的括弧内。

sentences.english: Also, put the filename in double quotes or angle brackets.
sentences.chinese: 此外，请将档名放在双引号或角括弧内。

sentences.english: The tritones are bracketed , and the derivative pentatonic scale written alongside.
sentences.chinese: 三全音被括弧起来和衍生的六音阶也加在旁边。

sentences.english: Put the words in parentheses in their correct order.
sentences.chinese: 将括弧内的词按正确的语序排好。

sentences.english: All right. I hate this language, because I always want to have parens.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌这门语言，因为我总是得打括弧。

definition: Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
capital letters/uppercase letters/block letters/banker's anti-fraud numerals
Chinese guillemet 《》(punct. used for names of books etc)
